Script.name: aktualizuj_ziola
Script.script: local url = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Aruccio/herbs_database/main/herbs_data.json" if herbs then herbs.data_url = url end registerAnonymousEventHandler("scriptsLoaded", function() herbs.data_url = url end, true)

Script.name: my_gps()
Script.script: function my_gps(id,str) amap:set_position(id, true) cecho("<orange:>\n"..str) end

Script.name: kamien()
Script.script:
local gems_magic = { ["ogien"] = "sandy_brown", ["powietrze"] = "steel_blue", ["woda"]="sky_blue", ["ziemia"]="tan", ["czysta magia"] = "alice_blue", ["magia umyslu"]="aquamarine", ["magia zycia"]="sea_green", ["magia smierci"]="plum", ["elektr"]="lemon_chiffon", ["kwas"]="yellow_green", ["spaczen"]="pale_green", ["trucizna"]="lime_green", ["zimno"] = "light_cyan" }
function kamien(kamyk, str) local kolor=gems_magic[str] or "gray" selectString(kamyk, 1) replace(kamyk.." ["..str.."]") end
